remarks: Proof of (biconditional form of) ~ nn0suc from the core axioms of CZF. See also ~ bj-nn0sucALT .  As a characterization of the elements of ` _om ` , this could be labeled "elom".  (Contributed by BJ, 19-Nov-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-nn0suc $p |- ( A e. _om <-> ( A = (/) \/ E. x e. _om A = suc x ) ) $.
$d A x $.
